awards.text: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: This movie describes the founding of the modern Olympics and concentrates on the creation of the American team and their trials in getting to the Olympics in Athens.
plot: This movie describes the founding of the modern Olympics and concentrates on the creation of the American team and their trials in getting to the Olympics in Athens.
title: The First Olympics: Athens 1896
